description: Defines a Polymer behavior for a checkable element with validation features, including properties like 'checked', 'toggles', and 'value', and methods for validation and state change handling.

classes.name: Polymer.IronCheckedElementBehaviorImpl
classes.description: Implementation of a checkable element behavior with validation and state management.

methods.name: _checkedChanged
methods.description: Updates the 'active' state and 'value' when 'checked' property changes, and fires 'iron-change' event.

methods.name: _requiredChanged
methods.description: Sets or removes 'aria-required' attribute based on 'required' property.

methods.name: _getValidity
methods.description: Returns true if the element is valid based on 'required' and 'checked' states.
